EK-TM4C1294XLÂ¶

The EK-TM4C1294XL is the backbone of the water quality sensor. It handles all of the communication between the sensors and all web applications. Running at a cool 120 MHz and including ethernet capabilities, this MCU is the ideal candidate for this project.

This part can be purchased via the following link: https://store.ti.com/tiva-connected-launchpad.aspx
